short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly export your Chrome bookmarks to organized JSON files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pintree Bookmarks Exporter is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help you seamlessly export your bookmarks into well-organized JSON files, and by using the Pintree open-source project, turn your bookmarks into a personal bookmark navigation site. Whether you’re looking to back up your bookmarks, migrate to a new browser, or manage your bookmarks in a more structured way, this tool is the perfect solution.

Why Install Pintree Bookmarks Exporter?

	•	Selective Export: Choose which bookmarks you want to export, rather than exporting all bookmarks, for greater flexibility.
	•	Easy Export: Quickly and easily export your selected bookmarks to JSON files.
	•	Retain Favicon: The exported JSON files retain the website’s favicon, making the bookmark information more complete.
	•	Organized Files: The exported JSON files are well-structured, making them easy to manage and view.
	•	Create a Personal Bookmark Navigation Site: After exporting the JSON file, you can use the Pintree (https://github.com/Pintree-io/pintree) open-source project to turn your bookmarks into a personal bookmark navigation site.
	•	Open Source: Based on the MIT license, you can freely use and modify the project.

This tool is open-sourced under the MIT license. For more information, please visit Pintree Bookmarks Exporter (https://github.com/Pintree-io/bookmarks-exporter)
